title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of green-eyed, bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man seated with hands resting on legs; silver watch chain attached to vest; gold ring on man\'s PL ring finger; blurry trees and blue sky in distance; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
